pr_title: [DROOLS-5367] Avoid needs of kmodule.xml during kiepmmlmodel generation/instantiation

timeline.message: [DROOLS-5367] Implemented common AbstractPMMLTest to be extended by all PMML integration tests. Refactored PMML integration tests. Removed all kmodule.xml
[DROOLS-5367] Moved AbstractPMMLTest to java directory. Refactored PMMLRuntimeFactory to accept a File as parameter
[DROOLS-5367] Implemented predictable PKGUUID. Moved common methods to org.drools.core.util.StringUtils
[DROOLS-5367] Add ReleaseId public getter to KnowledgeBuilderImpl
[DROOLS-5367] Defined PMMLRuleMapper/PMMLRuleMappers with codegen factories, templates and tests
[DROOLS-5367] Populating KnowledgeBuilderImpl with "Model" at load time
[DROOLS-5367] Implemented optional use of pre-generated PkgUUID

timeline.bodyText: Make the new field serializable adding it to readExternal/writeExternal methods.
timeline.author: mariofusco

timeline.message: [DROOLS-5367] Minor fixes for Kogito integration. Add tests

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into DROOLS-5367

# Conflicts:
#	kie-pmml-trusty/kie-pmml-models/kie-pmml-models-mining/kie-pmml-models-mining-tests/src/test/java/org/kie/pmml/mining/tests/SegmentationMajorityVoteMiningTest.java

timeline.bodyText: Can you please add an assertion?
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: What about a private static class instead of this method? Just to avoid to create an anonymous inner class for every test
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: This class should be moved to a more "public" module like some -api module. Wdyt?
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText:
@danielezonca
This would require moving other classes to API. I agree, but I would prefer to do that in the "clean up api" ticket https://issues.redhat.com/browse/DROOLS-5688
replies.author: gitgabrio
